dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement]
dmca.body:
Please note that the web sites referenced in your DMCA notice do not reside
within our network as of 11:51:43 a.m. (GMT-6) on March 6, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, March 05, 2006 4:11 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; webmaster@seska.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement
Date: Fri, 03 Mar 2006 15:53:07 -0500
From: Seska Lee <webmaster@seska.com>
To: support@serious-partners.com, info@serious-partners.com
CC: abuse@noc4hosts.com, abuse@theplanet.com

To whom it may concern,

The following webpages are using stolen videos and images which are the
property of http://www.seska.com. Please have the following videos and
images removed immediately:

webpage http://hostave2.net/homemadevids/home_porn_697/index.html
image http://hostave2.net/homemadevids/home_porn_697/scr/2.jpg

webpage http://hostave2.net/homemadevids/home_porn_126/index.html
image http://hostave2.net/homemadevids/home_porn_126/scr6/2.jpg

webpage http://galleries.wild-love.com/home_99kk/
video http://galleries.wild-love.com/home_99kk/home_01.mpg
video http://galleries.wild-love.com/home_99kk/home_02.mpg
image http://galleries.wild-love.com/home_99kk/part1.jpg
image http://galleries.wild-love.com/home_99kk/part2.jpg

Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, this email serves as
actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings. The
information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury,
I state that I am the owner of an exclusive right infringed by the specified
material.

Seska Lee
http://www.seska.com


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEC2HivK/XpJs6oyURAkZBAJ4kTamxN74X73852AU6WVILNX9wUgCghqBg
VUCn/XVWj4mX4Z7lN6cWXqE=
=j82G
